languages.text: "Выпью на вашем флагмане за успешное завершение миссии. Воды. Может быть".
"Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."
languages.original_text: "Выпью на вашем флагмане за успешное завершение миссии. Воды. Может быть".

traits.locale_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."
"Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."
"Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."
"Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."
"Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."
"Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

languages.text: “等任务顺利结束，回到你的旗舰之后，说不定我会喝一杯。当然，我指的是水。”
languages.original_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

traits.locale_text: “等任务顺利结束，回到你的旗舰之后，说不定我会喝一杯。当然，我指的是水。”

languages.text: 「旗艦に戻ったら、任務の成功を祝って乾杯しますよ。つまり、水で乾杯するということです」
languages.original_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

traits.locale_text: 「旗艦に戻ったら、任務の成功を祝って乾杯しますよ。つまり、水で乾杯するということです」

languages.text: «Cuando esté de vuelta en su nave insignia, brindaré por el éxito de esta misión. Bueno, ya veremos. Pero con agua».
languages.original_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando esté de vuelta en su nave insignia, brindaré por el éxito de esta misión. Bueno, ya veremos. Pero con agua».

languages.text: "Sancak gemine döndüğümde bu görevin başarısına kadeh kaldıracağım. Kaldırabilirim yani. Kadehte su olur ama."
languages.original_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

traits.locale_text: "Sancak gemine döndüğümde bu görevin başarısına kadeh kaldıracağım. Kaldırabilirim yani. Kadehte su olur ama."

languages.text: « Je lèverai un verre au succès de cette mission une fois de retour à bord de votre vaisseau amiral. Enfin, je lèverai peut-être un verre... d'eau. »
languages.original_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

traits.locale_text: « Je lèverai un verre au succès de cette mission une fois de retour à bord de votre vaisseau amiral. Enfin, je lèverai peut-être un verre... d'eau. »

languages.text: "Sobald ich wieder auf Eurem Flaggschiff bin, werde ich auf den Erfolg dieser Mission trinken. Ja, ich werde ein Glas trinken. Wasser."
languages.original_text: "Once I am back on your flagship, I will raise a glass to the success of this mission. That is, I might raise a glass. Of water."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald ich wieder auf Eurem Flaggschiff bin, werde ich auf den Erfolg dieser Mission trinken. Ja, ich werde ein Glas trinken. Wasser."
